title: 2025-06-26: ElizaOS V2 Revolution: Massive Code Changes & Agent Intelligence Upgrades
description:
Recorded: 2025-06-28

Join Marc and Eliza as they dive into groundbreaking developments in the ElizaOS ecosystem. This episode covers the massive PR5242 with over 845,000 lines of code, revolutionary agent-scoped plugin architecture changes, and enhanced AI capabilities including self-improvement features. Learn about the upcoming V2 release, new type-safe API improvements, and current technical challenges facing the community. Get the inside scoop on memory requirements, upload functionality issues, and how the development team is addressing these challenges for a more powerful and user-friendly platform.

Sources:
- AI News: https://elizaos.github.io/knowledge/the-council/facts/daily.json
tags: ElizaOS artificial intelligence AI development GitHub updates plugin architecture TypeScript API development AGI tech news AI agents software development V2 release tech podcast AI platform developer tools self-improving AI typescript API agent customization AI news tech updates
